title: My dream of a flying car
description: Paul Moller talks about the future of personal air travel -- the marriage of autos and flight that will give us true freedom to travel off-road. He shows two things he's working on: the Moller Skycar (a jet + car) and a passenger-friendly hovering disc.
author: Paul Moller
keywords: TED, talks, design, engineering, invention, technology, transportation
